lines.text: I like elephants. Except when they die and you have to bury them.

[to Bernice]
You look like a potato with hair.
When I go down the tubes, I go down the tubes.

[singing]
Keep your paws off of my dawg! 'Cos if you mess with Rover, I'll have to run you over...

[escaping under the floorboards]
It's a good thing I read Escape from Devil's Island.

[Jimmy has retrieved the ransom money]
How did you do it?

[holds up a copy of "Child Heist"]
You see this book?

[rolls off bench. Voice over]
Of course!

[Jimmy and Maurice read a sign that says "Deture" and Maruice follows the instructions]
Did you see that sign? Detour was spelled wrong.
